Why hire me?


Good day ladies and gentleman from Degordian.

Why should we hire this guy?, you ask yourself. 

    Well, for starters, I love coding. I love everything about it.
The complexity, the ability to make the things that shock and awe. The 
optimization... Code refactoring ... testing ... solving problems.
Everything.
Where some may see a problem, I see a puzzle. Some hate changing 
languages and technologies, but I love the challenge. When some will lose 
their nerves I will happily jump in and work on it until I crack it.

But enough about what I love.
What can I offer?

Like I said, I love this. And that plays a big part in any profesion that 
has anything to do with creativity. This gives me motivation, 
not just to do my job, but to do it RIGHT! 
I will give it my all to any task I am given, and I will always 
do it to the best of my abilites. 
This combined with my ability and willingness to learn makes me an asset.
An adaptable asset. My end goal is to be a full stack developer, so working 
in front or back end of any app written in any language suits me either way.
Just point me at what you want done and look at me go.

Although the amount of my experience is with server-side programming,
where my current skill-set is best applied, i am happy to jump in wherever
I am needed. 

In the end, I will just keep getting better and better, the only question 
is, will I get better with you or without you?

The only thing left is to take a leap of faith and invite me in for a 
chat.

PS. I do have code examples for viewing purposes, just call me in
and we can talk about it. :)

Looking forward to your call.
                                                Bojan Madžarac
